description:
Provide AI assistants with powerful SEO research capabilities by accessing keyword data, domain analysis, backlink information, and traffic metrics. Enable comprehensive keyword research and competitive analysis across multiple countries and currencies. Simplify SEO data retrieval and analysis for enhanced decision-making.

Note: this is NOT an official MCP server by Keywords Everywhere.

capabilities.name: get_keyword_data
capabilities.description: Get Volume, CPC and competition for a set of keywords

capabilities.name: get_related_keywords
capabilities.description: Get related keywords based on a seed keyword

capabilities.name: get_pasf_keywords
capabilities.description: Get 'People Also Search For' keywords based on a seed keyword

capabilities.name: get_domain_keywords
capabilities.description: Get keywords that a domain ranks for

capabilities.name: get_url_keywords
capabilities.description: Get keywords that a URL ranks for

capabilities.name: get_domain_traffic
capabilities.description: Get traffic metrics for a domain

capabilities.name: get_url_traffic
capabilities.description: Get traffic metrics for a URL

capabilities.name: get_page_backlinks
capabilities.description: Get backlinks for a specific URL

capabilities.name: get_unique_page_backlinks
capabilities.description: Get unique backlinks for a specific URL
